title: Shadow Assassin Dojo Adventure #82
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Shadow Training Hall
rooms.description: A dimly lit training hall with wooden floors worn smooth by centuries of practice. Training dummies line the walls, and weapon racks hold various ninja tools. Moonlight filters through paper screens, casting long shadows. The air smells of incense and old wood.

items.name: wooden weapon rack
items.description: A rack holding various training weapons and tools

items.name: ancient training manual
items.description: A worn scroll containing the teachings of the dojo
items.text: The Five Principles of Shadow: Master Kurogane teaches that a true assassin must master five arts. The first principle was established in the year 1582, when our order was founded. Remember: stealth, precision, patience, honor, and shadow.

items.name: training equipment chest
items.description: A large chest with three compartments for storing training gear

items.name: Master's instruction scroll
items.description: A scroll sealed with the master's personal seal
items.text: To my student: You have trained well. To proceed to the Meditation Chamber, you must prove your knowledge. The iron shuriken will open the way. Remember who you are - you are Kage, Shadow Blade of the Obsidian Moon Clan.

items.name: ceremonial iron shuriken
items.description: A perfectly balanced throwing star with the dojo's symbol etched into it

items.name: practice training dummy
items.description: A wooden dummy wrapped in straw and cloth, used for strike training

items.name: reinforced sliding door
items.description: A heavy door with a circular lock mechanism designed to accept a shuriken-shaped key

rooms.name: Chamber of Silent Meditation
rooms.description: A serene room with tatami mats covering the floor. Three stone statues of legendary assassins stand in alcoves along the walls. A small fountain trickles peacefully in the corner. Calligraphy scrolls hang from the ceiling, swaying gently. The room radiates an aura of focused calm.

items.name: statue of Shadowblade
items.description: A stone statue of a hooded figure holding twin daggers
items.text: Shadowblade - First Master of Stealth. Known for moving unseen through the Imperial Palace. His techniques are preserved in the Sacred Scroll Vault.

items.name: statue of Nightwhisper
items.description: A statue depicting a lithe assassin in a striking pose
items.text: Nightwhisper - Master of Poison. She eliminated targets without ever being seen. Her victims simply fell asleep and never woke. Her legacy lives in the shadows.

items.name: statue of Master Kurogane
items.description: The central statue showing a stern master in meditation pose
items.text: Master Kurogane - Founder of the Obsidian Moon Clan. He established the dojo in 1582 and trained generations of shadow assassins. His wisdom guides us still.

items.name: stone meditation fountain
items.description: A small fountain with crystal clear water flowing over smooth stones

items.name: jade meditation token
items.description: A smooth jade disc with the clan symbol carved into it

items.name: scroll storage cabinet
items.description: A lacquered cabinet with multiple drawers for storing sacred texts

items.name: scroll of shadow philosophy
items.description: A scroll containing the philosophical teachings of the clan
items.text: The assassin must know three truths: Where is wisdom kept? In the Sacred Scroll Vault. Who founded our order? Master Kurogane. What is your true name? Only you can answer this, shadow warrior.

items.name: secret passage instructions
items.description: A scroll revealing the location of hidden passages
items.text: The path to the Master's Vault is protected by three questions. Only one who has studied the teachings and knows their own identity may pass. Seek the hidden door behind the eastern tapestry.

items.name: concealed vault door
items.description: A hidden door behind a tapestry, marked with three questions carved into the wood

password_questions.question: Where is wisdom kept?
password_questions.hint: Check the statue of Shadowblade and the philosophy scroll

password_questions.question: Who founded the Obsidian Moon Clan?
password_questions.hint: Read the statues carefully, especially the central one

password_questions.question: What is your assassin name?
password_questions.hint: The Master's note in the training hall reveals your identity

rooms.name: Master's Sacred Vault
rooms.description: You have reached the inner sanctum of the Shadow Assassin Dojo! The vault is filled with legendary weapons, ancient scrolls, and priceless artifacts from centuries of assassin history. In the center, on a black silk cushion, rests the Obsidian Blade - the legendary weapon of Master Kurogane himself. Moonlight streams through a skylight above, illuminating your achievement.

items.name: legendary Obsidian Blade
items.description: A perfectly crafted katana with a blade as black as midnight, said to cut through shadows themselves

items.name: display of legendary artifacts
items.description: Shelves holding masks, weapons, and tools used by the greatest assassins in history

items.name: Master Kurogane's final scroll
items.description: The master's last teachings, preserved for worthy students
items.text: To the one who reaches this vault: You have proven yourself worthy. You have mastered the trials, remembered the teachings, and discovered your true identity. The Obsidian Blade is yours. Use it with honor, Shadow Blade Kage.

rooms.win_message: You have completed the trials of the Shadow Assassin Dojo! As you grasp the Obsidian Blade, you feel the weight of centuries of tradition and the power of the shadow assassins flowing through you. Master Kurogane's spirit appears briefly, nodding in approval before fading into the moonlight. You are now a true master of the Obsidian Moon Clan. You win!
